summary: 500 Followers!
title: 500 Followers!
body:
There’s so much pressure now to have an awesome blog! lol.

I love you all so much <3

As a thank-you, I’ll be writing a secret smut fic for all my lovlies to drool over involving my two most requested characters and Reader!.

Keep an eye out over the next few days for it <3

blog.name: cloverbell13
blog.title: MOSTLY MARVEL...
blog.description: 22, she/her. I write... sometimes. Mostly I just obsess over Marvel, IRON DAD, sometimes StarWars, reblog fanart, memes, and make fanfic recommendations.    My AO3

summary: Gif set inspired by this post. @agib-2002 has sooo many little ficlets that help give me great ideas for gif sets. <3 LOVE YOU!...
caption:
Gif set inspired by this post. @agib-2002 has sooo many little ficlets that help give me great ideas for gif sets. <3 LOVE YOU!

Story:

Tragedy brings two very different lives together when Tony Stark is diagnosed with a rare heart condition and is in desperate need of a heart transplant. He is told that if they can’t find a donor soon, he’ll die. Meanwhile, Mary Fitzpatrick suffers from complications in childbirth and dies, leaving her newborn son completely alone in the world. Her last act was being able to provide a suitable heart for Tony at the very last possible moment, as his own heart was failing. During his recovery from the surgery, he hears the story of the mother that gave her life so both he and her newborn son could live. Quietly making his way into the hospitals nursery, he finds the little baby and instantly his new heart fills with adoration. Soon after he adopts the boy and names him Peter. 

I wish I had time to expand on this and write a full story! Maybe one day… but anyone else is welcome to explore this idea too! Big Thanks again to @agib-2002 for the ficlet that inspired this and the nonny that sent in the original ask.

blog.name: sorrythatwasmean
blog.title: I'm Sorry That Was Mean
blog.description: Bruce Banner RP blog// Sideblog of Leeriverofwordsjordan. Multi-verse and multi-muse friendly//

summary: Headcanon
body:
Headcanon

Why Bruce was excited about nano-tech for Tony’s suit:

1) THAT’S FREAKING AWESOME. SCIENCE IS AMAZING.
2) WHEN DID THIS HAPPEN? WHY DID I HAVE TO MISS THIS?
3) Tony has awesome style. I’m like a hobo.
3)CAN I HAVE NANO-TECH SO I DON’T WIND UP NAKED ALL THE TIME?

summary: Tony According to Steve
title: Tony According to Steve
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ufw4pi

by SomethingOfFandoms

Everybody knows something about Anthony Stark. Few know anything besides his public persona, and even fewer look past his defenses to see who tony truly is. OneShot. Stony with slight spiderson at the end. Not Civil War Compliant.

title: Moving Day
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Cp5KgU

by aliaoftwoworlds

Less than a week after Siberia, the others are returning, and everyone seems to expect Tony to go on as if nothing happened. He won’t give up Iron Man when he knows something big is coming, but he can’t work with them again. While he’s agonizing over the choice, a third option presents itself.

blog.name: dendrite-blues
blog.title: Dendrite Blues' Fanfics

summary: “Once Tamed” Boarding School AU
title: “Once Tamed” Boarding School AU
body:
Fandom: MCU

Rating: T (mild gore)

Pairings: Loki & Tony Stark (Pre-slash)

Summary: Loki fell. Twice. A jaded teen caught him.

Excerpt:

The man—Loki—pointed at him, his brows raised in an imploring look. Tony wanted a cigarette.

“I’m-” he sighed. “Tony. Tony Stark.”

Tony, Loki mouthed. Stay.

He put his bag down.

“I can’t stay. I have class. People will come looking.”

Loki stood, blinking at him like he was waiting for something. When Tony didn’t react, he picked up his bag and handed it to him. Eyeing the door expectantly.

[Read on AO3] [Chat with my on my brand new Twitter] [or the Frostiron Discord]
